item.title: Make your own Grail Diary!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: The Grail Diary, made by Indiana JonesÂ´ father, Henry Jones Sr.Â  from "Last Crusade", was actually what got me into this hobby. Late on e night I was surfing the Net for a bullwhip, when I stumpled over a webside all about this diary. My first thought was "Gee, what a bunch of nerds", but somehow the idea of making a diary of my own became more and more present. (Link courtesy of Moleskinerie)
